snippet.title: Potatostrike Trailer - Beta 2024
snippet.description:
Evil is roaming the stars. The Starchless Fleet has been mobilized to cause terror across the galaxy. The only thing standing in their way is the ultimate potato-based space fighter, Potatostrike.

A brand new FREE shmup game, available on itch:
https://lmg3864.itch.io/potatostrike

- Fight against Starchless and his followers in 3 hectic missions.
- Pick-and-choose your loadout from 6 primary weapons and 3 ordnance options.
- Unlock new Potatoes to experience the game in a new light.
- Comes with English and Spanish localization.
- Can be played with Keyboard, Mouse, or Gamepad (Mouse or Gamepad recommended).

Follow me on Mastodon for regular updates on my games:
https://mastodon.gamedev.place/@LMG3864

You can also find me and my other games here:
https://linktr.ee/lmg3864
